name: PANDEMIC - 1 Month Collab Project
description:
Pandemic is a Collab project made by Team 1.

We wear many hats but overall we are:

Jesus Fernandez Garcia [Uploader / Team/Project Leader] - 2D Level/Stage/Game Designer, 2D/2.5D Environment Artist [All Areas], Programming/Blueprint systems for AI/Boss for all game areas, Damage Systems [Player/Enemies], Several/Most HUD elements + Menus and Simple Game Mechanics [Stamina System + Pickups System]. 2D UI Art, Icons, weapon design and story. Cinematics, progression, events, dialogue, audio implementation and many, many more.

Sasha Navarrete - 2D Character/NPC/Enemy Artist [4 directional sprites for all characters + Weapon/Attacks], 2D Effects [Rifle Bullets] and Animations plus Loot-Bag and Keycard/Access-Card props.

Mark Plasencia - Programmer. Player Movement System, health/thirst/hunger systems, and overall project foundations towards a more complex system for a hunting game. Worked on some cut mechanics such as Inventory System and Crafting [+Deep Item/Resource Pickup System].

Pandemic is a 2D Top Down Shooter. Travel through 18 stages and fight zombies and mutant scorpions along the way with a rifle and a superweapon. The player will be able to grab pickups and collect keycards. The goal is to get from Bunker I to Bunker II through several locations such as a factory, an abandoned hospital and an abandoned supermarket. More info below for features, controls and backstory.

BACKSTORY:

HOW TO PLAY / FEATURES


CONTROLS

WASD To Move

Left Mouse Button to Fire Weapon

Shift to Sprint

M to Open the Map Menu [When Obtained]

P or Escape to Pause Menu

R to Restart Level

The player will have four main stats

STAMINA - auto-recovers

HEALTH, HUNGER AND THIRST - be sure to grab pickups around the world to keep your meters full.

CREDITS

Main Inspirations

DOOM by ID Software

Fallout by Bethesda
